General.Name: Citra Marga Nusaphala Persada
General.Description: PT Citra Marga Nusaphala Persada Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, constructs, operates, and maintains toll roads in Indonesia. It engages in implementing and providing consultancy services in the field of management, investment, information technology and telecommunications, transportation, project development, property management, and real estate; offers supporting services; and sells product components of highway construction. The company operates the Simpang Susun Waru - Juanda toll road in Surabaya; Depok - Antasari toll road in Jakarta; Soreang - Pasir Koja toll road in Bandung; Cileunyi - Sumedang - Dawuan Toll Road; and Sumedang Dawuan toll road. It also provides trade, development, procurement, contract, industry, land management, toll road support, and other services. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia.
General.Address: Gedung Citra Marga, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14350
